name: Dino Danger
description:
WIP

The player must navigate the Dino up and on top of the platforms in order to stay out of reach of the lava. Escape the volcano!

Other dinosaurs are panicking and will try to push you back down or bite you to stop you from reaching the top.  Be careful!

Core loop is jumping and shooting eggs

Launch at 1280 x 720 

Assets Used:

https://jesse-m.itch.io/jungle-pack

https://jonathan-so.itch.io/creatorpack

https://arks.itch.io/dino-characters
